name: Texas Tango
description:
Texas Tango is an experimental hardcore physics game which is bullets can be collide in the air.
With a lots of blood and a lots of fun, explode the opponents and see them flying in the air.

Game Modes & Features
  • Single Player & Multiplayer On Local Area Network
  • Realtime bullet physics
  • Powerful explosives
  • Ragdolls & Bloods
  • Fast paced gameplay
  • Zombie Mode
  • 11 Different Weapons

*Always requires an internet connection to get player info from Steam Web API
